game.name: Gridle
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Gridle은 강력한 파티를 관리하여 적의 물결을 물리치는 방치형 인크리멘탈 RPG입니다! 업그레이드, 치유, 재배치, 레벨업을 통해 50개의 초기 단계를 정복하고 끝없는 무한 단계에 도전하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Gridle is an incremental idle RPG where you’ll manage a powerful party to take down waves of enemies! Strategically upgrade, heal, reassign, and level up your party members to conquer the world!
